channel.title: Comments on: A recap: Corona Labs @ GDC 2013

item.title: By: Stefan Colins
item.dc:creator: Stefan Colins
item.description: Greetz from the Bazookas team! Nice to meet you all on GDC, we'll definitely keep in touch. Cheers
item.content:encoded: Greetz from the Bazookas team! Nice to meet you all on GDC, we’ll definitely keep in touch. Cheers

item.title: By: Greg Lemon
item.dc:creator: Greg Lemon
item.description: Hey! That's me! Thanks again for recording the vid, Charles. Always fun to show off what Corona can do!
item.content:encoded: Hey! That’s me! Thanks again for recording the vid, Charles. Always fun to show off what Corona can do!

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Thanks dingo. I hope you enjoyed GDC. It was a lot of fun for us.
item.content:encoded: Thanks dingo. I hope you enjoyed GDC. It was a lot of fun for us.

item.title: By: dingo
item.dc:creator: dingo
item.description: Has been nice to meet you all @GDC!
item.content:encoded: Has been nice to meet you all @GDC!
